title: How to Make a Rainbow Loom Bracelet

steps.title: Set up your Rainbow Loom kit.
steps.content: Set up your Rainbow Loom kit. Read the instructions that came with your loom and set it up like the directions say. Make sure the U-shaped pegs are facing up. The arrows should be facing away from your body.

steps.title: Place the first band diagonally.
steps.content: Place the first band diagonally. Place your first rubber band diagonally on a peg. Starting with the first middle peg is recommended. It doesn't matter what side you go to when you move the band diagonally, but stick with it.

steps.title: Place a second band.
steps.content: Place a second band. Place the second band diagonally from the first band, with the last peg you placed a band on serving as the starting point.

steps.title: Repeat the process.
steps.content: Repeat the process. Repeat those steps, reversing the direction of the diagonal each time, until you have what looks like a zig-zag all the way down the loom.

steps.title: Flip the loom.
steps.content: Flip the loom. Flip the rainbow loom so now the pegs are facing downwards. The arrows should be pointing towards your body. This will help you grab the bands to weave them.

steps.title: Use the hook.
steps.content: Use the hook. Use the hook to grab the second band on the first middle peg from underneath the first band.

steps.title: Place the band.
steps.content: Place the band. Flip the band on your hook so that it bends in half (bent over the band above it) and place it over the second peg in the next row. Whether it is to the left or right depends on what you chose earlier.

steps.title: Repeat this process.
steps.content: Repeat this process. Continue the process across the whole Rainbow Loom. You should end up with something that looks like the image above (like a series of connected circles).

steps.title: Add the clip.
steps.content: Add the clip. Get a C-clip or an S-clip from your kit. Hook it onto the last rubber band.

steps.title: Remove the bands from the loom.
steps.content: Remove the bands from the loom. Remove the rubber bands from the loom, carefully. Stretch the bracelet out.

steps.title: Connect the ends.
steps.content: Connect the ends. Connect the end of the bracelet to the C-clip.

steps.title: Done!
steps.content: Done! Enjoy your new bracelet. Now that you're finished, keep making more!

steps.title: Make the perimeter bands.
steps.content: Make the perimeter bands. With the arrows pointing up, loop a band from the first center peg to the first left peg. Next, loop a band from the first left peg to the second left peg, then the second to the third. Continue down the left line until you reach the second to last peg. Then loop a band from the second to last peg diagonally to the last middle peg. Go back to the beginning and repeat this for the other side, until you have bands all around the perimeter of the loom. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make the first burst.
steps.content: Make the first burst. Push all of the perimeter bands down. Then, place a band in Color A (whatever color you want) on the second peg of the middle row and the second peg of the right row. Then place five more bands going from the middle row peg to each of the surrounding pegs, in a clockwise motion. This should leave you with a starburst or asterisk shape. Push down all bands as you go.

steps.title: Make the next bursts.
steps.content: Make the next bursts. Place a band from the fourth peg of the middle row diagonally to the fourth peg of the right row. Do the clockwise bands again until you have another burst with a bottom that overlaps with the top of the first burst. Continue doing this until the whole loom is filled (inside the perimeter). Keep pushing down the bands each time. You can change the colors of the burst as you go.

steps.title: Place the middle circle bands.
steps.content: Place the middle circle bands. Double up a band in the perimeter color and place it on the final middle peg. Then double up another at put it at the center of the burst. Keep placing these doubled bands at the center of each burst until you reach the end.

steps.title: Start the weave.
steps.content: Start the weave. Turn the loom around so that the arrows are facing you. Then, hook the bottom loop of the closest starburst from the first middle peg and pull it up (careful not to dislodge the other bands on the peg) Loop it onto the center peg.

steps.title: Weave all of the bursts.
steps.content: Weave all of the bursts. Next, starting from the center of the burst and moving counter-clockwise, use your hook to grab the first half of each band and loop it onto the peg it starts on (going center, peg, center, peg, center, peg, and so on). Always be careful not to dislodge the other bands on the center peg. You should be left with something that looks like a flower or a sun. Do this process for all of the bursts.

steps.title: Weave the perimeter.
steps.content: Weave the perimeter. Starting with the band that goes around the bottom right and bottom center pegs, grab the end that's wrapped around the bottom center peg and pull it down (without dislodging the other bands) And over the bottom left peg, so that both ends of the band are on that peg. Then, do the same for the band which wraps around the bottom right and second to left pegs. Proceed until the entire left side is done, ending when you hook the last left side band onto the last middle peg. Then go back to the start and do the right side of the loom.

steps.title: Add the end loop.
steps.content: Add the end loop. Reach your hook down through all of the bands on the last middle peg. Grab a new band that you hold in your fingers, pull it up through the bands, and then slide your hook through the loop of the new band, so that it's completely wrapped around the hook. Then, holding the hook in your hand with the loop still around it, pull the whole bracelet off of the loom.

steps.title: Add the extension.
steps.content: Add the extension. Add new bands onto the loom, around five of them all down one side. Loop the band from the first peg onto the second peg, then the second peg onto the third, third onto the fourth, and so on. Then, take the first loop on the end of your bracelet (on the side without the hook) and treat it like another rubber band, adding it to the chain you've started on the loom. Next, chain the bands from the end with the bracelet all the way down to the first band.

steps.title: Add the C clip.
steps.content: Add the C clip. Add a C or s clip to the last band on the loom, take the whole thing off of the loom, and then clip the C or s clip onto the loops on your hook. Take your hook out and you're done! [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enjoy your new bracelet.
steps.content: Enjoy your new bracelet.

steps.title: Set up your loom so that the rows are in the shape of a "v".
steps.content: Set up your loom so that the rows are in the shape of a "v".

steps.title: Take a colored band and take it from the bottom peg and stretch it up to the peg right above it.
steps.content: Take a colored band and take it from the bottom peg and stretch it up to the peg right above it. [3] X Research source Do the same on all of the bottom pegs.

steps.title: Color banding:
steps.content: Color banding: Continue doing the same thing all the way up the loom.

steps.title: Center banding:
steps.content: Center banding: Take a neutral color and, skipping the first set of pegs, place it on the loom so it looks like an upside-down triangle.

steps.title: Make sure the arrow is pointing towards you when you begin hooking.
steps.content: Make sure the arrow is pointing towards you when you begin hooking. Take the bottom colored band and pull it through the other bands and on to the peg directly in front of it it.

steps.title: Continue hooking.
steps.content: Continue hooking. Do the same thing on all of the rows above the first one until you reach the end if the loom. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Once you reached the end gently hook the band on both pegs and transfer the bands on the last middle peg.
steps.content: Once you reached the end gently hook the band on both pegs and transfer the bands on the last middle peg.

steps.title: Add the end loop.
steps.content: Add the end loop. Reach your hook down through all of the bands on the last middle peg. Grab a new band that you hold in your fingers, pull it up through the bands, and then slide your hook through the loop of the new band, so that it's completely wrapped around the hook. Then, holding the hook in your hand with the loop still around it, pull the whole bracelet off of the loom.

steps.title: Add the extension.
steps.content: Add the extension. Add new bands onto the loom, around 8-10 of them all down one side. Loop the band from the first peg onto the second peg, then the second peg onto the third, third onto the fourth, and so on. Then, take the first loop on the end of your bracelet (on the side without the hook) and treat it like another rubber band, adding it to the chain you've started on the loom. Next, chain the bands from the end with the bracelet all the way down to the first band.

steps.title: Add the C or S clip.
steps.content: Add the C or S clip. Add a C or S clip to the last band on the loom, take the whole thing off of the loom, and then clip onto the loops on your hook.

steps.title: Take your hook out and you're done!
steps.content: Take your hook out and you're done!

steps.title: Take any color of rubber band.
steps.content: Take any color of rubber band.

steps.title: Twist it into the number 8.
steps.content: Twist it into the number 8. Put it on your thumb and your index finger.

steps.title: Add another rubber band on top of the 8 formal band but this time you don't need to make it 8 formal.
steps.content: Add another rubber band on top of the 8 formal band but this time you don't need to make it 8 formal. Just make it normal.

steps.title: Take the 8 formal band upper to the normal band carefully from the thumb and the index finger.
steps.content: Take the 8 formal band upper to the normal band carefully from the thumb and the index finger.

steps.title: Add another band put it on the upper part and take the lower part to the upper.
steps.content: Add another band put it on the upper part and take the lower part to the upper.

steps.title: Make a rubber band into the shape of an 8.
steps.content: Make a rubber band into the shape of an 8. Put one loop on each finger.

steps.title: Repeat two more times.
steps.content: Repeat two more times.

steps.title: Put the middle band down to the bottom.
steps.content: Put the middle band down to the bottom.

steps.title: Bring the new middle band over your fingers.
steps.content: Bring the new middle band over your fingers.

steps.title: Put another band over on your fingers.
steps.content: Put another band over on your fingers. However, this time, do not place it in the shape of an 8.

steps.title: Repeat steps 3 and 4.
steps.content: Repeat steps 3 and 4.

steps.title: Keep on repeating steps 3, 4, 5 and 6 until the band is the right size.
steps.content: Keep on repeating steps 3, 4, 5 and 6 until the band is the right size. You can test this by getting the end of it then putting it at the top of the band.

steps.title: Gather all the bands on one finger.
steps.content: Gather all the bands on one finger. Then put them on the other finger.

steps.title: Get your "S" or "C" clip.
steps.content: Get your "S" or "C" clip. Clip it to all of the bands on the finger.

steps.title: Clip the other end of the clip to the other end of the bracelet.
steps.content: Clip the other end of the clip to the other end of the bracelet. Now you're done!

steps.title: Grab between 10 and 20 bands any color.
steps.content: Grab between 10 and 20 bands any color. Make sure you have an S clip.

steps.title: Grab your first band.
steps.content: Grab your first band. Cross it like an X.

steps.title: Once you have crossed the first band, add another on top of the crossed band.
steps.content: Once you have crossed the first band, add another on top of the crossed band.

steps.title: Carry on doing that until you reach the desired finish length of your bracelet.
steps.content: Carry on doing that until you reach the desired finish length of your bracelet.

steps.title: Grab the S clip.
steps.content: Grab the S clip. Put the S clip on. Done. That's all there is to the single loop.

steps.title: Make sure your loom arrow is facing away from you.
steps.content: Make sure your loom arrow is facing away from you. Make sure you have an S or C clip.

steps.title: Place your perimeter bands on the loom.
steps.content: Place your perimeter bands on the loom.

steps.title: Place your bands that go straight across the loom.
steps.content: Place your bands that go straight across the loom.

steps.title: Place your bands that go through the middle set of pegs on your loom.
steps.content: Place your bands that go through the middle set of pegs on your loom.

steps.title: place a cap band on the last middle peg.
steps.content: place a cap band on the last middle peg. twist your cap band in a figure 8 and turn one part upon itself. now, we are ready to loom!!

steps.title: Loom the Middle bands.
steps.content: Loom the Middle bands.

steps.title: Place the bands across the loom again.
steps.content: Place the bands across the loom again.

steps.title: Loom the Outer bands.
steps.content: Loom the Outer bands.

steps.title: Slip your hook down through the area and grab your extra band and slip it through the channel.
steps.content: Slip your hook down through the area and grab your extra band and slip it through the channel.

steps.title: Create your extension for your wrist.
steps.content: Create your extension for your wrist. and there you go! that's how you make a ladder bracelet.

steps.title: Set up your loom so that the rows are straight.
steps.content: Set up your loom so that the rows are straight. Do not use the third column, if possible.

steps.title: Follow steps 2 to 5 of the triple single bracelet without the third column.
steps.content: Follow steps 2 to 5 of the triple single bracelet without the third column.

steps.title: Start hooking like you would with the triple single bracelet.
steps.content: Start hooking like you would with the triple single bracelet.

steps.title: Follow steps 7 to the end of the triple single bracelet to complete!
steps.content: Follow steps 7 to the end of the triple single bracelet to complete!
